adInputRuns.offer: Unify data engineering, analytics, and AI on a single Lakehouse platform — reduce infrastructure costs, accelerate insights, and deploy production-ready AI faster without managing fragmented tools.
adInputRuns.audience: Enterprise data leaders, engineering managers, analytics leaders, and AI/ML decision-makers at mid-market to enterprise companies (1,000+ employees).
adInputRuns.strategyNotes: Generate 2–3 ad input packs for Facebook and Google focused on enterprise data, analytics, and AI buyers. Emphasize cost reduction, platform consolidation, faster time-to-insight, and production AI readiness. Tone should be authoritative, technical, and executive-friendly. Avoid hype language — focus on operational outcomes and business impact. Assume long sales cycles and optimize for high-intent lead capture.
adInputRuns.customInputs:
{
  "industry": "Enterprise Software",
  "category": "Data & AI Platform",
  "buyer_personas": [
    "VP of Data",
    "Head of Analytics",
    "Director of Engineering",
    "Chief Data Officer",
    "AI/ML Lead"
  ],
  "company_size": "1000+ employees",
  "sales_motion": "High ACV B2B"
}
